sentences.en: Blindness is a common complication of diabetes.

sentences.en: Defective mitochondria are passed down only from the mother. They can lead to brain damage, muscle wasting, heart failure and blindness.

sentences.en: Early diagnosis and treatment can usually prevent blindness.

sentences.en: He wanted to prevent needless cases of blindness.

sentences.en: He'll do your bidding, and for that his blindness is his chief asset.

sentences.en: His blindness is the result of an accident.

sentences.en: I have long since come to terms with my blindness.

sentences.en: On the other hand, altitude can increse the possibility of eye injuries especially of flash blindness.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 高度却可增加对眼睛伤害的可能性,特别是闪光目盲.

sentences.en: Tests for blindness include a test for the eye preservation reflex and an obstacle test.
sentences.cn: 盲视试验包括眼的保护性反射和障碍试验.

sentences.en: The very limit of human blindness is to glory in being blind.
sentences.cn: 人类盲目性的最根本局限就在于其盲目性面前感到荣耀.

sentences.en: We must try to get rid of our blindness and raise the level of our political awareness.

sentences.en: What exactly is colour-blindness and how do you find out if you have it?
